name: photo-of-the-day-november-24-2008
title: Photo Of The Day: November 24, 2008
author: Christy Frink
excerpt: One day we’ll get tired of the Radnor Lake fall foliage pictures (or all the trees will finally get naked), but as of now, we’re still in love! Thanks to relic57 for the submission. Photo Of The Day will be a recurring feature for Nashvillest as long you keep giving us stuff to post. Don’t worry–we’ll give you props. Just add them to the pool or tag them with “Nashvillest” if you’re feeling lazy.
contentEncoded:
One day we’ll get tired of the Radnor Lake fall foliage pictures (or all the trees will finally get naked), but as of now, we’re still in love! Thanks to relic57 for the submission.

Photo Of The Day will be a recurring feature for Nashvillest as long you keep giving us stuff to post. Don’t worry–we’ll give you props. Just add them to the pool or tag them with “Nashvillest” if you’re feeling lazy.
